snippet.title: 'Jurassic Park' in context at the National Museum of Natural History film festival
snippet.description: An expert answers these questions and more at a film festival at the National Museum of Natural History

snippet.title: T. rex fossils arrive at Smithsonian's National Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: It will replace a life-size T. rex replica that's been displayed at the Natural History Museum since 1999.

snippet.title: New T. rex at the Natural History Museum gives the Redskins an opportunity
You don't have to roam for more dinosaurs
snippet.description: Where to view dinosaur fossils while the Smithsonian's Natural History Museum is close for renovations.

snippet.title: Smithsonian to host summer sleepovers for students
snippet.description: A "Night at the Museum" will be a reality for students at the Smithsonian this summer.

snippet.title: On the road with the 'Nation's T. rex'
snippet.description: Documenting a dead dinosaur's journey from Montana to the Smithsonian's Natural History Museum.

snippet.title: T. rex coming at Smithsonian
snippet.description: The bones are coming from a museum in Montana and will be on display for 50 years.

snippet.title: 'The Nation's T. rex' is en route to Washington
snippet.description: Fossil from Montana scheduled to arrive at the Smithsonian's Natural History Museum on Tuesday.

snippet.title: Troubled history fuels Japan-China tension
snippet.description: Strolling through China's sprawling memorial to a 1937 massacre by Japanese troops, a 64-year-old retired teacher said the incident remains an open wound.
